Procurement Sucks.
So We decided to fix it.

Bidcurement automates soliciting the bids you need from trusted, local contractors.
Schedule your demo to see how Bidcurement can revolutionize your procurement process:

Connecting Contractors, Governments and Communities

Save yourself (and your staff) from pointless calls, constant followup, and thousands of pages of bid docs.

Bidcurement saves small and local governments, education departments, and civil engineering firms from the worst parts of the procurement process. The results? Highly competitive bids fr​om trusted talent, in no t​ime flat. We're building networks between local contractors and the agencies that need them, all around the country, and saving everyone time, money, and trouble in the process.

Think of us like SLED superheroes - without the over-the-pants underwear.

How it Works​

Post a Bid

Fill our your bid's details once, and we'll get it in front of dozens of local contractors to ensure competition. Have contractors in mind? Invite them to bid as you post.

Find the Best Bids

Contractors' bids are formatted to meet your standards, and we highlight all the essential bid information, and important details about the bidders - like ratings and (demographics?)

Sign Me Up!

Communicate Seamlessly

Answer questions, announce deadlines or changes, and notify all bidders about project status from our easy-to-use dashboard - no more tracking contact details and fielding followup calls.

Not a tool for time-wasters.

If you love burning hours calling ten contractors to repeat the same information, answer the same questions, and send the same documents, Bidcurement is not for you.

If you love fielding endless followup calls "enquiring about the status" of all your open bids, Bidcurement is not for you.

If you get a real kick out of sorting through thousands of pages of bid docs to find the essential information buried there, Bidcurement is not for you.

Bidcurement was built by both sides of the procurement equation to solve our common problems.

transparency, and a better, faster procurement process for all.
